name: Autumn Worldwide
description:
Autumn is a new age communications firm, offering Social, Digital and Mobile solutions. Social Media Marketing is Autumns flagship service.
In a rare combination, Autumn offers both Social Media Listening and Social Media Outreach services.Brand consultants at heart, with a zeal for new age communication, Autumn has its strength in insights, strategy, messaging and technology that not only bridges the gap between traditional and digital media but more importantly between ideas and technology.
READ MORE...
